attributes.description: MyRide will find the ride of your dreams, supported by exceptional customer service and countrywide delivery of all our new and pre-owned vehicles. Our team has decades of experience in the automotive industry and represents some of the greatest brands in the world. For your peace of mind, we pay attention to the smallest details to provide you with quality vehicles that keep you and your family safe. Our skilled sales staff provide excellent customer service, whilst our in-house finance experts ensure you get the best offer to suit your budget. We encourage test drives and welcome all trade-ins. Contact us today to find your ride with MyRide. We promise to make your vehicle purchasing experience seamless and convenient.

attributes.title: 2014 Nissan NP200 1.6 A/C Safety Pack

attributes.description:
Renault Kwid: It’s Time to Live!
Could this be South Africa’s next favourite car? We certainly think so as not only is the Renault Kwid the physical embodiment of modern French driving, but it is also just as much at home roaring down the highway as it is darting gracefully through the traffic of even the most gridlocked South African cities. It’s robust, yet fun design is 100% technology-driven and this amazingly French vehicle is perfectly suited for South African car lovers who are young or simply young at heart. With its bold, perfectly structured grille that highlights the now legendary Renault diamond logo, this is probably the most affordable piece of sexy French automotive machinery to ever to hit the roads of Africa (and indeed the world).

Everything from the signature Renault headlights and stylish chrome trim on the outside, to the horizontal uncluttered lines of the luxurious vehicle interior boldly proclaim this to be a car of the people, and one that is most certainly not skimping on good looks and abundant sex appeal.

So don’t hesitate a moment longer, take control of your destiny and book a test drive of the all new, very affordable Renault Kwid!
